column5: was working in ottawa on a DND  site..  this monster buck stepped out into the field...too many points to count...could not get a picture as no cameras allowed...this site is east of hwy 416 north of fallowfield rd.. wanted to know if anyone from that area has got a picture of this deer...according to DND staff on site the deer is out regular and has never had a reason to leave the property.
Department of National Defense like Base Borden or Trenton.  Michael
Just hunt for the sheds in a few months
DND department national defence its a little different in ottawa this particular site is classed as an experimental farm......the work on new crops...types of corn,grain
have to have special access to this property 10 foot fences   not allowed to just enter and walk around  but would love to get the sheds
I can see why you seen a record buck. MUTANT.
Experimental Farm, nothing new. Does your dog run "Off Game"? Let it go! Hahaha.
well that could be  but there is a bunch of deer there..look normal  does fawns smaller bucks..no hunting pressure
